CustomField.description: Reads the Activity.Subject line and returns an Activity Type based on standardized text (i.e. Call No Answer, Call Connect, etc.)
CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( CONTAINS(Subject,"Call- No Answer"), CONTAINS(Subject,"Call- Left Message"), CONTAINS(Subject,"Call- Connect"), CONTAINS(Subject,"Call- Qualification"), CONTAINS(Subject,"Call- Discovery"), CONTAINS(Subject,"Call- Demo"), CONTAINS(Subject,"Call- Invalid Number"), CONTAINS(Subject,"Call- Qual+Disco"), CONTAINS(Subject,"Call- Disco+Demo"), CONTAINS(Subject,"Call- Qual+Disco+Demo"), BEGINS (Subject,"Outbound Call"), BEGINS (Subject,"FastCall") ),"Call Out",
IF (ISPICKVAL(CallType, "Inbound"), "Call In",
IF ( BEGINS(Subject, "Task") , "Task",
IF ( BEGINS(Subject, "Meeting") , "Meeting",
IF ( BEGINS(Subject, "Message Sent") && CONTAINS( Comment_Catch_for_Mass_Mail_Type__c, "Mail Merge: Yes") , "Mass Email",
IF ( BEGINS(Subject, "Message Sent") || BEGINS(Subject, "Email:"), "Email Sent",
IF ( BEGINS(Subject, "Reply") || BEGINS (Subject,"Message Sync") , "Email Reply",
IF ( BEGINS(Subject, "Message Opened") , "Email Open",
IF ( BEGINS(Subject, "Link Clicked") , "Email Click",
"Other")))))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Reads the Activity.Subject line and returns an Activity Type based on standardized text (i.e. Call No Answer, Call Connect, etc.)
CustomField.label: Activity Type OS
